Comment.Language: From the Nativity Feast until the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: v/etaumacf qen B/ylee~m: kata nic~m/ m~p~rov/t/kon: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who was born in Bethlehem, according to the prophetic voices. Save us and have mercy on us.
الذي ولد في بيت لحم كالأخبار النبوية. خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
